readBasic.description: Allow read permission on basic accounts information for authorised accounts

readIdentities.description: Allow read permission on sort-code, account number and name for authorised accounts

readBalances.description: Allow read access to balances for authorised accounts

readProducts.description: Allow read access to product details for authorised accounts

readBeneficiaries.description: Allow read access to beneficiaries for authorised accounts

readBeneficiariesIdentities.description: Allow read access to beneficiaries identities (account number) for one or more accounts
